Телефон

Elements.Inputs.UITelephone

any:      [value = '']
string:   [placeholder = '+7 987 654-32-10']
string:   [pattern = "\+[0-9]{1,3}\s+[0-9]{3}\s+[0-9]{3}-[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{2}"]
string:   [fieldname = 'telephone']
string:   [size]              ['small', default, 'medium', 'large']
string:   [color]             bulma colors ['link', 'primary', 'info', 'success', 'warning', 'danger'] for border
boolean:  [required = true]
boolean:  [readonly = false]
boolean:  [disabled = false]
boolean:  [valid = true]
string:   [class = '']
function: [onchange]
